item.description:
Practice the moves you learn in class or on the dance floor in a low key fun environment! This is a time to practice without the stress of a club scene.

This salsa pr치ctica is open to all people in the Cambridge / Boston area. We are lucky enough to host the pr치ctica in a beautiful dance studio near Central Square.

So perfect those hard moves, warm your body up, then head to Ryles for a night of club dancing after! Please spread the word and invite your friends.

We will charge a $5.00 cover in order to pay for the studio, buy some snacks and drinks, and hopefully save up for a guest DJ.

Please note that we can NOT wear heels unfortunately. Please wear jazz sneakers or soft soled jazz / practice shoes, socks, or bare feet!


Details below!

-----

When: November 14th & 21st (Sundays),
December 12 & 19 (Sundays)

5:00 pm until 7:00 pm - right after Nancy's new class.

Location:
185 Green Street
Cambridge, MA 02139
617-864-3191
www.greenstreetstudios.org

Thanks for your support and see you at the pr치ctica!

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group
